post.author: 김민
post.content:
Hi,
If you are looking for Java postion, please mail resume to me. They have a intermediate java position. It's permenent and company is located at Mississauga.
Required Skill Sets:
- Networking Programming(Socket) - System Level Experience(thread, process) - Web Client/J2EE.
Mail : mkim777@hotmail.com
post.title: Java Intermediate Position (Permanent)
